segments.text: So what do you think of my new dress ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it's great ! I really like the color , and it goes really well with your eyes . I've actually been eyeing that dress at Maxine's for a while now , but I wasn't sure I could afford ninety-five dollars for a dress at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's the price they were advertising it at . I was hoping it might go on sale soon . Why , how much did you pay for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bought it for one hundred and forty-five dollars at Helen's Boutique . I didn't know I could get it cheaper somewhere else .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course ! Everything at Helen's is overpriced , and they sell things that you can find at almost every other clothing store ! Why didn't you shop around ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know , I just saw the dress and thought about how pretty it looks and how much I wanted it . I guess I was too impulsive .
segments.speaker: S1
